getStartedDescription: An application that will help you monitor the working time.
getStartedLanguage: Please select the language you speak.
loginDescription: Enter your login code to continue to the GiveJob Timer.
tokenIsCorrect: The token you entered is correct.
redirectToManagerRegistration: Now, you will be redirected to the MANAGER registration form.
redirectToEmployeeRegistration: Now, you will be redirected to the EMPLOYEE registration form.
loginCodeWillBeDisplayed: After successful registration, a special login code will be displayed, please remember it.
pressButtonToChooseInterestedDocument: Press button to choose interested document
basicSectionDescription: This section contains very basic information about you like name, surname and nationality.
name: Name
contactSectionDescription: To be in touch, please provide one of the three forms of contact.
termsOfUseIsRequired: Accept regulations and privacy policy to complete registration.
seeDocumentsHint: To view the documents, click on the link below.
acceptRegulationsIsRequired: Confirmation of the regulations is required.
acceptPrivacyPolicyIsRequired: Confirmation of the privacy policy is required.
oneOfThreeContactsIsRequired: Please provide one of the three forms of contact.
registerSuccess: Registration went successfully. Now you can sign in.
exitRegistrationContent: Are you sure u want to exit from registration form?
